description.@en: The movement of the heavens above reveals secret truths of the world. Interpreting these omens through use of crystal balls, astrology and casting rune stones, you can detect warning signs of endeavors either ill-omened or well-favored by Fortune herself.

effect.@en: Select one player Character and attempt to foretell their future with an Incantation Test. If successful, when the same ally uses a Fortune Point over the next 24 hours, the Fortune Point is immediately restored to the Fortune Pool. This benefit cannot be given or gained more than once per day.
